thread.title: This Tencent Business Is Still Singing a Happy Tune

author: Julie Steinberg
title: This Tencent Business Is Still Singing a Happy Tune
text:
Tencent Holdings Ltd. may have lost a chunk of its market value this week, but one of its businesses is surging in the eyes of investors. 
The valuation of Tencent Music Entertainment Group, the Chinese internet giant’s digital music-streaming business, has soared in recent weeks after some of the company’s shares changed hands in private-market transactions, according to people familiar with the matter. Some recent stock trades valued Tencent Music at around $25 billion, one of the people said. 
... RELATED VIDEO How Alibaba and Tencent Became Dominant in Mobile Payments Chinese tech companies Alibaba and Tencent have emerged as global leaders in mobile-payment technology. This animated video charts the key steps along their rise to the top.
